title: Palindrome Check
problem_statement:
Palindrome Check

Problem Description

You are given a string S of length N. The string is comprised of only lowercase alphabets. You have to check whether any anagram of this string is palindrome. If it is a palindrome anagram exists, print 'YES' or 'NO' (without quotes).

Input Format

The first line contains an integer N, and N is the length of the string.

The second line contains the String S.

Output Format

Output 'YES' or 'NO' depending on the existence of the palindromic anagram.

Examples

Example 1:

Input: N = 5, S = abcab
Output: YES

Explanation: The anagram 'abcba' is palindromic. So, the answer would be YES.

Example 2:

Input: N = 5, S = aaaaa
Output: YES

Constraints

  • 1 <= N <= 105
  • 'a' <= S[i] <= 'z'
